## checkLen variable

校验字符或数组长度  依赖于 async-validator 校验

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
checkLen: (min?: number, max?: number, message?: string, type?: string, trigger?: RuleTrigger) => {
    type: string;
    min: number;
    max: number;
    message: string;
    trigger: RuleTrigger;
}
```
